text: If you know your Harry Potter, you know bezoars. They're real, and people are poaching porcupines to get them. https://on.natgeo.com/2Whh4Dm  via @ptr_yeung
author: Rachael_Bale

text: There's a lot of conflict between leopards and humans in India, but one devout Hindu community has it figured out. https://on.natgeo.com/2Wb0QeK  Lovely story by @isabella_tree
author: Rachael_Bale

text: I've had a hard time keeping track of the gray wolf debate and how at-risk they are. @bittelmethis has a great report on the state of the wolves.
author: Rachael_Bale

text: Wildlife researchers in Iran have been jailed on suspicion of spying, their camera traps used as evidence against them. Learn about their important work and dedication to conservation: https://on.natgeo.com/2JfmXzi
author: Rachael_Bale

text: Just came across this cartoon by ⁦@elclimo⁩ and it made my morning.
author: Rachael_Bale
